defaultValue.description: Specifies the items that are selected by default

dropdownClassName.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 className 属性

dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. 'min-width' is set by default and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. false, which turns off virtual scrolling
dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 `min-width`，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。false 时会关闭虚拟滚动

dropdownStyle.description: The style of the drop-down menu

filterTreeNode.description: Whether to filter based on the input items, the value of treeNodeFilterProp is used as the property value of the TreeNode to be filtered by default
filterTreeNode.type: boolean | Function(inputValue: string, treeNode: TreeNode) (函数需要返回 bool 值)
filterTreeNode.description_zh: 是否根据输入项进行筛选，默认用 treeNodeFilterProp 的值作为要筛选的 TreeNode 的属性值

getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body, and if you're having trouble scrolling the menu, try modifying the scrolling area and positioning it relative to it.
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。

labelInValue.description: Whether or not to wrap the label of each option into value will change the value type from 'string' to the format of '{value: string, label: VNode, halfChecked(treeCheckStrictly when valid): string[] }'
labelInValue.description_zh: 是否把每个选项的 label 包装到 value 中，会把 value 类型从 `string` 变为 `{value: string, label: VNode, halfChecked(treeCheckStrictly 时有效): string[] }` 的格式

maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display

maxTagPlaceholder.description: What is displayed when the tag is hidden
maxTagPlaceholder.description_zh: 隐藏 tag 时显示的内容

multiple.description: Support for multiple selections (automatically becomes true when treeCheckable is set)
multiple.description_zh: 支持多选（当设置 treeCheckable 时自动变为 true）

placeholder.description: The selection box defaults to text

searchPlaceholder.description: The search box defaults to text

searchValue.sync.description: The value of the search box, which can be fetched by the user input via the 'search' event
searchValue.sync.description_zh: 搜索框的值，可以通过 `search` 事件获取用户输入

treeIcon.description: There is no default style for displaying the icon before the TreeNode title, if it is set to true, you need to define the icon related style
treeIcon.description_zh: 是否展示 TreeNode title 前的图标，没有默认样式，如设置为 true，需要自行定义图标相关样式

showCheckedStrategy.description: Defines how the selection is backfilled. 'TreeSelect.SHOW_ALL': Displays all selected nodes (including the parent node). 'TreeSelect.SHOW_PARENT': Show only the parent node (when all children under the parent node are selected). By default, only child nodes are displayed.
showCheckedStrategy.description_zh: 定义选中项回填的方式。`TreeSelect.SHOW_ALL`: 显示所有选中节点(包括父节点). `TreeSelect.SHOW_PARENT`: 只显示父节点(当父节点下所有子节点都选中时). 默认只显示子节点.

showSearch.description: Show search box in drop-down (only available in radio mode)
showSearch.description_zh: 在下拉中显示搜索框(仅在单选模式下生效)

size.description: Select the box size, optionally 'large' small

suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

treeCheckStrictly.description: In the checkable state, the node selection is fully controlled (the parent and child node selection states are no longer associated), which will force 'labelInValue' to be true
treeCheckStrictly.description_zh: checkable 状态下节点选择完全受控（父子节点选中状态不再关联），会使得 `labelInValue` 强制为 true

treeData.description: treeNodes data, if set then you don't need to manually construct a TreeNode node (value is unique across the tree)
treeData.description_zh: treeNodes 数据，如果设置则不需要手动构造 TreeNode 节点（value 在整个树范围内唯一）

replaceFields.description: Replace the label, value, key, and children fields in treeNode with the corresponding fields in treeData
replaceFields.description_zh: 替换 treeNode 中 label,value,key,children 字段为 treeData 中对应的字段

treeDataSimpleMode.description: Use a simple format of treeData, set it with reference to the configurable type (in this case, treeData should be structured like this: \[{id:1, pId:0, value:'1', label:"test1",...},...], 'pId' is the id of the parent node)
treeDataSimpleMode.type: false | Array<{ id: string, pId: string, rootPId: null }>
treeDataSimpleMode.description_zh: 使用简单格式的 treeData，具体设置参考可设置的类型 (此时 treeData 应变为这样的数据结构: \[{id:1, pId:0, value:'1', label:"test1",...},...], `pId` 是父节点的 id)

treeDefaultExpandAll.description: By default, all tree nodes are expanded

treeNodeFilterProp.description: The corresponding treeNode property for input filtering
treeNodeFilterProp.description_zh: 输入项过滤对应的 treeNode 属性

treeNodeLabelProp.description_zh: 作为显示的 prop 设置

events.name: change
events.description: This function is called when a tree node is selected
events.description_zh: 选中树节点时调用此函数

events.name: search
events.description: Callback when the value of the text box changes

events.name: treeExpand
events.description: Called when a node is expanded

TreeNode.name: checkable
TreeNode.description: 当树为 checkable 时，设置独立节点是否展示 Checkbox

TreeNode.name: key
TreeNode.description: 此项必须设置（其值在整个树范围内唯一）

TreeNode.name: value
TreeNode.description: 标题默认根据此属性值进行筛选（其值在整个树范围内唯一）

TreeNode.name: scopedSlots
TreeNode.description: 使用 treeData 时，可以通过该属性配置支持 slot 的属性，如 scopedSlots: { title: 'XXX'}
